localeContext.SubTitle_TextBlock: Create a ScubaGear configuration file for exclusions, annotations, and omissions
localeContext.ExclusionsInfo_TextBlock: Exclusions are supported for the following products: {0}
localeContext.Organization_Required_TextBlock: Required. Must be in format: name.onmicrosoft.com or name.onmicrosoft.us
localeContext.OrgName_Required_TextBlock: This option is required for BOD submissions.
localeContext.ExclusionsTabInfo_TextBlock: Configure exclusions for specific policies. Exclusions allow you to customize policy behavior by excluding specific users, groups, domains, or other entities from policy evaluation. Products must be selected on the main page before configuring exclusions.
localeContext.AnnotationsTabInfo_TextBlock: Add comments and annotations to policies for documentation and tracking purposes. Products must be selected on the main page before configuring annotations.
localeContext.OmissionsTabInfo_TextBlock: Select policies to omissions from the assessment and provide justification. Products must be selected on the main page before configuring omissions.
localeContext.PreviewTabInfo_TextBlock: Preview your configuration before saving. Ensure all exclusions and omissions are correctly set.
localeContext.ScubaRunDescription_TextBlock: Execute ScubaGear assessment using the current configuration. Ensure you have generated a valid YAML configuration before running.

localePlaceholder.Description_TextBox: Enter a description for this configuration (optional)
localePlaceholder.SearchPlaceholder_TextBox: Search policies by name or ID...

localeInfoMessages.NoPoliciesAvailable: No policies available for this product.

localePopupMessages.CloseConfirmation:
Are you sure you want to close the ScubaGear Configuration Editor?

You will lose all entered information.

To save your data, click 'Preview & Generate' button and click 'Download YAML'.
localePopupMessages.GraphNotConnected: Microsoft Graph is not connected.`n`nTo connect Graph, restart the application with the -Online parameter or use Connect-MgGraph manually.

Organization_HelpLabel.Title: Organization Domain
Organization_HelpLabel.Content: Enter your organization's domain (e.g., example.onmicrosoft.com). This is used to connect to your Microsoft 365 tenant.

AdditionalSections.Note: Must be a valid Microsoft 365 tenant domain

OrgName_HelpLabel.Title: Organization Name
OrgName_HelpLabel.Content: Enter the name of your organization. This is used for documentation purposes.

AdditionalSections.Required: This option is required for BOD submissions
AdditionalSections.Note: This will be included in the configuration file

GlobalTab.name: Global Settings
GlobalTab.description: Configure global settings that apply across all policies and configurations

ScubaRunConfig.description: This section allows you to run ScubaGear with the current configuration.

DarkMode.name: Dark Mode
DarkMode.description: Show ScubaGear report in dark mode.

Quiet.name: Quiet Mode
Quiet.description: Run ScubaGear in quiet mode, suppressing report

NumberOfUUIDCharactersToTruncate.name: Number of UUID Characters to Truncate
NumberOfUUIDCharactersToTruncate.description: Specify the number of characters to truncate from the UUID.

capolicy.name: Conditional Access Policy Excluded Groups and Users
capolicy.description: Exclude specific groups or users from conditional access policies

fields.name: Group Object Id's
fields.description: Group IDs to exclude from this policy

fields.name: User Object Id's
fields.description: User IDs to exclude from this policy

role.name: Privilege Identity Management Excluded Roles
role.description: Exclude specific groups or users from role requirements

fields.name: Group Object Id's
fields.description: Group IDs to exclude from this policy

fields.name: User Object Id's
fields.description: User IDs to exclude from this policy

sensitiveAccounts.name: Sensitive Accounts
sensitiveAccounts.description: Defines sensitive accounts filters used to select accounts to assign to the strict preset security policy

fields.name: Included User Service Principal Names
fields.description: Users to include as sensitive accounts

fields.name: Included Groups Names
fields.description: Groups to include as sensitive accounts

fields.name: Included Domain Names
fields.description: Domains to include as sensitive accounts

fields.name: Excluded User Service Principal Names
fields.description: Users to exclude from sensitive accounts

fields.name: Excluded Groups Names
fields.description: Groups to exclude from sensitive accounts

fields.name: Excluded Domains Names
fields.description: Domains to exclude from sensitive accounts

sensitiveUsers.name: Defender's Sensitive Users
sensitiveUsers.description: Defines sensitive user accounts by display name and email address

fields.name: Sensitive Users
fields.description: Each value should be a string in the form of the display name and email address separated by a semicolon.

partnerDomains.name: Partner Domains
partnerDomains.description: Defines a list of frequent partner domain names

fields.name: PartnerDomains
fields.description: Defines a list of frequent partner domain names

forwardingDomains.name: Allowed Forwarding Domains
forwardingDomains.description: Domains allowed for automatic email forwarding

fields.name: Enter domains allowed for forwarding
fields.description: List of domains allowed for automatic email forwarding

agencyDomains.name: Agency Domains
agencyDomains.description: Defines a list of agency domain names that should be specified

fields.name: Agency Domains
fields.description: Defines a list of agency domain names that should be specified

PreferredDnsResolvers.name: Preferred DNS Resolver IP Addresses
PreferredDnsResolvers.description: Use this parameter to control what DNS resolver is used to fetch the SPF, DKIM, and DMARC records

fields.name: Enter preferred DNS resolver IP addresses:
fields.description: Defines a list of preferred DNS resolvers

skipDoH.name: Skip DNS over HTTPS
skipDoH.description: Use this parameter if you prefer ScubaGear not retry any failed DNS queries

fields.name: Check to skip DNS over HTTPS:
fields.description: Set to true to skip DoH for failed DNS queries

annotation.name: Annotation
annotation.description: Exercise care when marking incorrect results because this can inadvertently introduce blind spots when assessing your system.

fields.name: Incorrect Result (aka False Positive)
fields.description: Check to indicate that the result is incorrect

fields.name: Comment
fields.description: The annotation to add to the report. A warning will be printed if control is marked incorrect with no comment provided as justification

fields.name: Remediation Date
fields.description: The date a failing control is anticipated to be implemented

omissions.name: Omissions
omissions.description: Exercise care when omitting policies because this can inadvertently introduce blind spots when assessing your system.

fields.name: Rationale
fields.description: Provide a reason the policy should be omitted from the report

fields.name: Expiration Date
fields.description: A date after which the policy should no longer be omitted from the report.

email.invalidScriptMessage: Email domain must be accessible and not temporary.

yearmonthday.invalidScriptMessage: Date must be between today and five years from now.

AppId_TextBox.windowTitle: Select a registered Scuba service principal application:
AppId_TextBox.name: Applications
